attributes.action: £10 cash entry fee in arrivals at British airports to all those who dont hold a British passport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: When i visited Turkey they charged all those who do not hold a Turkish passport £10 per person cash to enter the country, if the government did that here they wouldnt be as concerned about upping taxes and fuel supplements just as long as they dont charge british citizens!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
